direct_enhancements.reason: Both methods handle the rendering of API changes with similar control flows and exception handling.
Both methods process and render lists of endpoints, but with different contexts (new, missing, deprecated).
Both methods handle IOExceptions similarly by wrapping them in a RendererException.
Both methods access and manipulate API response data, though for different purposes.
The render method indirectly depends on HTTP status phrases, which are accessed via the getReasonPhrase method.
